Name: Confodere
Found: Find: First given in tutorial with Barlowe.

Name: Melio Arcus
Description: A bow glyph that targets enemies automatically.

Name: Ascia
Found: Find: Ruvas Forest, Minera Prison Island, Monastery (Hard Mode) , Drop: Axe Knight

Name: Redire
Description: A glyph to magnetize blades for additional effect.

Name: Lapiste
Description: Pulverize enemies with giant fists of stone.

Name: Pneuma
Description: This glyph creates squalls to sweep enemies away.

Name: Ignis
Found: Find: Tristis Pass, Drop: Fire Demon

Name: Luminatio (Luminare) -
Description: Call forth a ball of light.

Name: Vol Luminatio
Description: Call a ball of light that tracks enemies.

Name: Umbra
Description: Command the malice of the dead.

Name: Nitesco
Description: Concentrate magic energy into a destructive beam.

Name: Acerbatus
Description: Calls forth the power of spite.

Name: Dextro Custos
Description: Attack with the right head of Cerberus, guardian of Hell.

Name: Sinestro Custos
Description: Attack with the left head of Cerberus, guardian of Hell.

Name: Dominus Hatred (Dominus Odium) -
Description: One piece of Dominus; summons a pillar of light.

Name: Dominus Anger (Dominus Ira) -
Description: One piece of Dominus; unleashes a cluster of energy.

Name: Magnes (Circulus) -
Notes: Effect: Allows Shanoa to propel herself through magnetic discs.

Name: Paries
Description: Pass through solid walls in specific locations.
Notes: Effect: Allows passage through wall portals.

Name: Volaticus
Description: Conjures a pair of wings, allowing the power of flight.

Name: Rapidus Fio
Description: A glyph of divine motion that enables faster movement.

Name: Vis Fio
Description: Temporarily increase STR and the effects of physical glyphs.

Name: Fortis Fio
Description: Temporarily increase CON and physical resistance.

Name: Sapiens Fio
Description: Temporarily increase INT and the effects of magical glyphs.

Name: Fides Fio
Description: Temporarily increase MIND and magic resistance.

Name: Felicem Fio
Description: Grants the user a temporary boost of LUCK.

Name: Inire Pecunia
Description: Temporarily increase the amount of money received by enemies.
Notes: Effect: Increases Gold received from enemies.

Name: Arma Felix
Notes: Effect: Transforms Shanoa into a werecat. She can attack with claw-swipes and rapid tail-whips, both at the cost of MP. Special: Shanoa is able to talk to the cats in Wygol Village. Black Panthers and Ladycats become allies.

Name: Arma Chiroptera
Notes: Effect: Transforms Shanoa into a Lady Bat. Special: When Shanoa hits an enemy with a kick, she regains 1 HP for each time it hits.

Name: Arma Machina
Description: Grants every ability of an automaton.
Notes: Effect: Transforms Shanoa into an automaton. Special: Can break spikes upon contact.

Name: Refectio
Description: Increases the rate of physical regeneration.

Name: Arma Custos
Description: Grants the mighty power of Cerberus.
Notes: Effect: Increases Shanoa's STR while active and the stat boost rises each time her HP decreases. Special: If all Custos glyphs are equipped at once, the stat boost from Arma Custos increases by 50%, and the damage dealt by Sinestro Custos and Dextro Custos also increase slightly.

Name: Fidelis Caries
Description: Summon zombies that fight to the death.

Name: Fidelis Alate
Description: Summon guardians to glide down from above.

Name: Fidelis Polkir
Description: Summon Polkir to descend on your enemies.

Name: Fidelis Medusa
Description: Summon Medusa Heads in a strangely familiar pattern.

Name: Fidelis Aranea
Description: Summon skull spiders to skitter about when needed.
Notes: Effect: Summons Skull Spiders. Special: Poisons enemies.

Name: Fidelis Mortus
Description: Summon a lively assortment of the dead.
Notes: Effect: Summons Jiang Shi. Special: Curses enemies.

Name: Dominus Agony (Dominus Angor) -
Description: One piece of Dominus; shrouds you in Dracula's magic.
Notes: Effect: Boosts Shanoa's stats but drains her HP.
